messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

files or not opening chrome browser hi yes meantime guided using ie ticket got solved several days ago thank you best regards hello opening documents files does work chrome browser for moment issue infrastructure level we have raised ticket infrastructure investigating find solution for issue for you can use explorer for users download document file locally best regards engineer en sent monday files or opening chrome browser hi please raise ticket for you or whom concern solve issue again files or opening chrome browser kind regards administrator sent monday re purchase po hi how video link looks be broken starting below screen should select rows click receive best regards consultant sent friday purchase po dear we have purchased for pro retina dual core en mini adapter apple thunderbolt gigabit adapter please log ticket with for allocation please take into consideration mandatory for you access receipts section order receive item or you ordered here how video kind regards administrator
